name: Lost in the woods (ashley_cho)
description:
A and D to move left and right, space to jump. Character will speed up as game progresses, get as far as you can!

My original idea was to have red riding hood being chased by a wolf. However, because of time constraints I've settled on using placeholder assets to create a simple first prototype. Looking forward to continue working on this in the future so feedback would be much appreciated. Hope you enjoy :)
